overview: A group of high school misfits who cant stay out of trouble are given an assignment in their broadcasting class in order to graduate. all hell breaks loose. late nights and crazy antics are a thing of the past for these friends. well, maybe not. for Stephen, Kevin and Ryan, making the transition to stoner slackers to high school grads can be tricky, since they don't take anyone or anything seriously. they spend their time making the best of any situation and looking for good time while dragging their fr-enemy christy into the dram
title: Class Acts
